participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music, but feels guilty about not spending enough time with loved ones.
participant_1.background: I love playing guitar but sometimes I spend too much time practicing and not enough time with my family. I have a pet husky. I have a diverse ethnic background, but I identify most with my Filipino heritage. I haven't spoken to my family in years. I gave my doberman a treat for being a good boy.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and enthusiastic about outdoor activities, but struggles with feelings of sadness and a constant appetite.
participant_2.background: I once saw a whale while on a boat trip with my family. I'm always hungry. I get sad a lot. I love rock climbing. My favorite fruit is apple.

content.text: Good just got back from a rock climbing trip.
Oh that sounds fun! I've never rock climbed before.
Oh you should try it! It's so much fun. It's like a big puzzle. You have to figure out the best way to get to the top.
That sounds really cool. Maybe I'll try it out someday.
Yeah you should! And if you're ever in the area, let me know and I'll take you climbing!
Thanks for the offer. I really appreciate that.
No problem. It's my favorite hobby and I love sharing it with people.
Well I'm sure I'll enjoy it.
So what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking, camping, and fishing.
Oh that sounds like a lot of fun. I like to do those things too.
We should go do something together sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to do that.
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free.
Thanks! I'll look forward to it.
